mapper.sql: a.id, a.fid, a.interface_name as interfaceName, a.method_name as methodName, a.run_time as runTime, a.success, a.time
mapper.select:
select
from sys_log_monitor_interface_call a where id = #{id}

select
from sys_log_monitor_interface_call a where 1=1
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
order by time desc
mapper.insert: insert sys_log_monitor_interface_call(id, fid, interface_name, method_name, run_time, success, time) values ( #{id}, #{fid}, #{interfaceName}, #{methodName}, #{runTime}, #{success}, #{time} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_log_monitor_interface_call a where 1=1
and ${arg.name} ${arg.symbol} #{arg.data}
